summary: Comprehensive testing of LeadForge Excel bulk upload functionality completed successfully. All requested features from the review request have been verified and are working correctly. Backend API tests show 100% success rate with Excel upload endpoint working perfectly (uploaded 50 leads successfully). Frontend testing confirms Upload Excel button functionality, file processing, and search capabilities are all operational.
passed_tests: Backend API health check - 100% success rate (35/35 tests passed)
Login functionality working with admin/admin123 credentials
POST /api/upload/leads endpoint working perfectly - uploaded 50 leads from bulk_test_50.xlsx
GET /api/upload/template endpoint returning correct column template
Upload Excel button visible and clickable on /leads page
File upload processing working - sample_leads_100.xlsx processed successfully
Leads table displaying correctly with proper pagination
Search functionality working - successfully filtered results for 'RAJ CONTRU'
Search field dropdown with multiple options (Name, Phone, Email, Enquiry No, Dealer, State, Employee)
Search results showing filtered data correctly (2 matching results found)
Table shows all required columns: Enquiry No, Name, State, Dealer, Segment, Qualified, Stage, Actions
Leads data displaying with proper formatting and badges for status
Date filter showing Apr 2023 - Mar 2024 range as expected
All CRUD operations for leads working (Create, Read, Update, Delete)

success_percentage.backend: 100% (35/35 API tests passed including upload functionality)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major features working, minor selector issue in test script)
